ai-patthana16.48:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.48:0.3_0: the things associated with modes and things associated with those of the conditions.
ai-patthana16.48:1.1_0: Not seeing the causes and reasons, not the teaching associated with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.48:1.1_1: Not seeing the cause of impingements, not associated with no cause or condition. ...
ai-patthana16.48:1.1_2: Neither asking the Dhamma for the sake of not grasping, nor associated with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.48:2.1_0: Not seeing the cause, not unbeneficial cause, for the sake of non-existence, not for the sake of grasping.
ai-patthana16.48:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
